alert.note: Alert for St. Clair (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 7:42PM CST until December 15 at 8:30PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... St. Clair County in west central Missouri... * Until 830 PM CST. * At 742 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Appleton City to Schell City to near Walker, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Truman Lake... Appleton City... Osceola... Lowry City... Roscoe... Tiffin... Johnson City... Taberville... Iconium... Monegaw Springs... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
